languages.text: Сломленный член дома Гапрак действительно был причастен к покушению на Вольного Торговца, но Абеляр уверен, что за организацией стоит кто-то другой.

traits.locale_text: Сломленный член дома Гапрак действительно был причастен к покушению на Вольного Торговца, но Абеляр уверен, что за организацией всего стоит кто-то другой.

languages.text: Even though the broken member of House Gaprak did have a hand in the attempt on the Rogue Trader's life, Abelard is convinced that someone else is behind the entire plot.
languages.original_text: Сломленный член дома Гапрак действительно был причастен к покушению на Вольного Торговца, но Абеляр уверен, что за организацией стоит кто-то другой.

traits.locale_text: Even though the broken member of House Gaprak did have a hand in the attempt on the Rogue Trader's life, Abelard is convinced that someone else is behind the entire plot.
Even though the broken member of House Gaprak did have a hand in the attempt on the Rogue Trader's life, Abelard is convinced that someone else is behind the entire plot.
Even though the broken member of House Gaprak did have a hand in the attempt on the Rogue Trader's life, Abelard is convinced that someone else is behind the entire plot.
Even though the broken member of House Gaprak did have a hand in the attempt on the Rogue Trader's life, Abelard is convinced that someone else is behind the entire plot.

languages.text: Zwar war ein Mitglied des Hauses Gaprak an dem Anschlag auf {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} beteiligt, aber Abelard ist überzeugt, dass jemand anderes hinter dem gesamten Plan steckt.
languages.original_text: Even though the broken member of House Gaprak did have a hand in the attempt on the Rogue Trader's life, Abelard is convinced that someone else is behind the entire plot.

traits.locale_text: Zwar war ein Mitglied des Hauses Gaprak an dem Anschlag auf {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} beteiligt, aber Abelard ist überzeugt, dass jemand anderes hinter dem gesamten Plan steckt.

languages.text: Même si l'ancien membre de la maison Gaprak a joué un rôle dans la tentative d'assassinat dont {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a été la cible, Abélard est convaincu que quelqu'un d'autre est derrière toute cette affaire.
languages.original_text: Even though the broken member of House Gaprak did have a hand in the attempt on the Rogue Trader's life, Abelard is convinced that someone else is behind the entire plot.

traits.locale_text: Même si l'ancien membre de la maison Gaprak a joué un rôle dans la tentative d'assassinat dont {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a été la cible, Abélard est convaincu que quelqu'un d'autre est derrière toute cette affaire.

languages.text: 失意の底にいるギャプラック家の一員が自由開拓者の命を狙った計画に手を貸したとはいえ、すべての陰謀の背後には別の誰かがいるとアベラルドは確信している。
languages.original_text: Even though the broken member of House Gaprak did have a hand in the attempt on the Rogue Trader's life, Abelard is convinced that someone else is behind the entire plot.

traits.locale_text: 失意の底にいるギャプラック家の一員が自由開拓者の命を狙った計画に手を貸したとはいえ、すべての陰謀の背後には別の誰かがいるとアベラルドは確信している。

languages.text: A pesar de que el miembro de la casa Gaprak estuvo involucrado en el intento de matar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, Abelard cree firmemente que hay alguien más detrás de la conspiración.
languages.original_text: Even though the broken member of House Gaprak did have a hand in the attempt on the Rogue Trader's life, Abelard is convinced that someone else is behind the entire plot.

traits.locale_text: A pesar de que el miembro de la casa Gaprak estuvo involucrado en el intento de matar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, Abelard cree firmemente que hay alguien más detrás de la conspiración.

languages.text: 尽管贾帕克家族的成员确实参与了谋害行商浪人的阴谋，但阿贝拉德坚信，这起阴谋的背后另有他人。
languages.original_text: Even though the broken member of House Gaprak did have a hand in the attempt on the Rogue Trader's life, Abelard is convinced that someone else is behind the entire plot.

traits.locale_text: 尽管贾帕克家族的成员确实参与了谋害行商浪人的阴谋，但阿贝拉德坚信，这起阴谋的背后另有他人。

languages.text: Gaprak Hanesi'nden kopan bir ferdin, Hür Tacir'in hayatına kastedilen olayda parmağı olduğu ortaya çıktı. Abelard ise bu entrikanın ardında başka birinin olduğunu düşünüyor.
languages.original_text: Even though the broken member of House Gaprak did have a hand in the attempt on the Rogue Trader's life, Abelard is convinced that someone else is behind the entire plot.
